attributes.action: be allowed to do extra learning at home with your child
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i have been told that the learning books which parents can get to do extra learning at home with they child are not good enough and that i have been stopped my the head teacher of my daughter school beacon hill primary first school. i want the public of the uk that every school should have in place where every parents can have access to what the kids are getting taught at school so we can work with the school with out getting banned for doing the extra learning
